text: Marlene Hagge (née Bauer; February 16, 1934 – May 16, 2023) was an American professional golfer. She was born in Eureka, South Dakota. Hagge was one of the thirteen founders of the LPGA in 1950. She won one major championship and 26 LPGA Tour career events. She is a member of the World Golf Hall of Fame. Hagge died in Rancho Mirage, California of complications from a fall, on May 16, 2023, at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== *Marlene Hagge bio at about.com Category:1934 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American golfers Category:Sportspeople from South Dakota Category:Sportspeople from California
title: Marlene Hagge
